main.name: Ifeoma Idoko
main.description: HOWDY!! I am a full stack developer and a former wealth management advisor who enjoys enhancing systems with innovative features and improvements
main.bio: When I am not programming, you can find me watching investigative tv or spending time in beautiful nature. My interests include documentaries, AI and the human psyche while my personality traits involve resourcefulness, free-spirited and a reserved nature. I do a lot of work with ReactJs, NodeJs, PostgreSQL and MongoDB but I am looking forward to learning Rust and Python.

resume.skillmessage: SOME OF MY SKILLS INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING

projects.title: Roamin
projects.category: (MVP only)An app that shows you activities within the chosen city based on the chosen travel personality

projects.title: Face Detection Bot
projects.category: This bot will detect the faces in an image url. I built this using ReactJs alongside RESTful APIs and Clarifai API

projects.title: Background Gen
projects.category: Website I built with only JavaScript. This creates background color combination you'll like for your project.

projects.title: Landing Page
projects.category: A React based landing page I created for a contest. I had fun creating this piece under pressure.

projects.title: My First
projects.category: The first project I coded. I used HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript with no responsiveness even. I have come a long way from here.
